description: This is a test class for AccountService, containing unit tests for methods that read bank and utility accounts, verifying behavior for found and not found cases.

classes.name: AccountServiceTest
classes.description: JUnit test class for testing AccountService methods related to reading bank and utility accounts.

methods.name: setUp
methods.description: Initializes mocks and the AccountService instance before each test.

methods.name: readBankAccount_found
methods.description: Tests successful retrieval of a bank account by its number.

methods.name: readBankAccount_notFound
methods.description: Tests behavior when a bank account with the given number is not found.

methods.name: readUtilityAccount_byProvider_found
methods.description: Tests successful retrieval of a utility account by provider name.

methods.name: readUtilityAccount_byProvider_notFound
methods.description: Tests behavior when a utility account by provider name is not found.

methods.name: readUtilityAccount_byId_found
methods.description: Tests successful retrieval of a utility account by its ID.

methods.name: readUtilityAccount_byId_notFound
methods.description: Tests behavior when a utility account by ID is not found.
